tool.name: Species Diversity
tool.description: Generate matrix of various species diversity indices from the MTBLS520 study.
tool.help:
========================= Eco-Metabolomics workflow =========================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | Species diversity |
Description | Generate matrix of various species diversity indices |
----- Input -----
Preprocess Rdata | Input Rdata file |
------ Output ------
Species diversity matrix | Species diversity matrix in CSV format |
Final Rdata | Rdata file. Please connect this Rdata file to the subsequent modules of the MTBLS520 workflow.
---------------------------------------------------
